from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim_new 

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPExaminationTimetableID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    T1.id                           AS ID,
    T1.casereference                AS CaseReference,
    T1.typeofexamination            AS TypeOfExamination,
    T1.name                         AS Name,
    T1.description                  AS Description,
    T1.deadlinestartdatetime        AS DeadlineStartDateTime,
    T1.date                         AS Date,
    T1.location                     AS Location,
    null                            AS EventLineItems,
    "0"                             AS Migrated,
    T3.Published                    AS Published,
    "Horizon"                       AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.typeofexamination,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlinestartdatetime,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.location,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_examination_timetable T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim T3 ON T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.typeofexamination,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.name,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.deadlinestartdatetime,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.date,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.location,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same row, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new CaseReference
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y')
    AND T1.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_examination_timetable)

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT
                        NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,caseReference
                        ,published
                        ,events

                        -- Start Horizon columns
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS ID
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS TypeOfExamination
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Name
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Description
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS DeadlineStartDateTime
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Date
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Location
                        -- End Horizon columns
                        
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,SourceSystemID
                        ,IngestionDate 
                        ,NULLIF(ValidTo, '') AS ValidTo
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,IsActive
                    FROM 
                        {service_bus_table}

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                        CAST(NULL AS Long) as NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,caseReference
                        , NULL as published
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS events
                        
                        -- Start Horizon Fields Not in SB
                        ,ID
                        ,TypeOfExamination
                        ,Name
                        ,Description
                        ,DeadlineStartDateTime
                        ,Date
                        ,Location
                        -- END Horizon Fields Not in SB

                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
FROM
    {horizon_table} AS Horizon
WHERE
    ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})
ORDER BY caseReference

#Establish aggregated view of attachmentIds
horizon_attachement= horizon_data.groupBy("caseReference").agg(collect_list("ID").alias("ID"))
horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("ID")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_attachement, on="caseReference", how="inner")

#sort columns into same order as service bus
horizon_data = horizon_data.select(service_bus_data.columns)
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, adviceid asc) AS NSIPAdviceID
    ,adviceid
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS Migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPAdviceID
                            ,CurrentRow.adviceid 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.adviceid IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = NextRow.adviceid
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT adviceid FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_s51_advice) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = Raw.adviceid 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT NSIPAdviceID
                        ,adviceId
                        ,adviceReference
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,title
                        ,titleWelsh
                        ,from
                        ,agent
                        ,method
                        ,enquiryDate
                        ,enquiryDetails
                        ,enquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,adviceGivenBy 
                        ,adviceDate
                        ,adviceDetails
                        ,adviceDetailsWelsh
                        ,status
                        ,redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentIds

                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,Section51Advice
                        ,EnquirerFirstName
                        ,EnquirerLastName
                        ,AdviceLastModified
                        ,AttachmentCount
                        ,AttachmentsLastModified
                        ,LastPublishedDate
                        ,WelshLanguage
                        ,CaseWorkType
                        --End Horizon only fields

                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(CAST(NSIPAdviceID AS bigint), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(title AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(titleWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(from AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(agent AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(method AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceGivenBy AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(status AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(redactionStatus AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(attachmentIds AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Section51Advice AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerFirstName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerLastName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AdviceLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentCount AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentsLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(LastPublishedDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(WelshLanguage AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(CaseWorkType AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")
select count(*) from odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice where isactive='Y'
